COMMENT_TX: $Willie Stargell's 7th career homer over the RF roof; only 18 total over Forbes Field RF roof to this point
68 minute rain delay before start of game
$umpire Chris Pelekoudas missed the game with the flu

$Bob Moose checked his swing on the 1-2 pitch, which sailed to the backstop and Manny Sanguillen scored; the pitch was called a ball by HP umpire Satch Davidson but Jim Bunning appealed to 1B umpire Augie Donatelli on the checked swing; Donatelli ruled that Moose swung for strike three; catcher threw the ball to 3B to get Bill Mazeroski trying to advance from 1B; Bunning then yelled to Don Money that Moose never ran to 1B; Money threw the ball to Deron Johnson; the umpires huddled, ruled Moose out and disallowed the run; this ruling was incorrect and in top of 8th umpires reversed the decision and 'restored' the Pirates' run
ej,myatg102,C,davis901,Call at 2B $Phillies coach Myatt ejected by base umpire Kibler for that Briggs was safe at 2nd umpire Satch Davidson
ej,dilaj101,P,varge901,Offensive remarks $Jack DiLauro (not in game) ejected by 3B umpire Vargo for making offensive remarks as he walked to bullpen
$Larry Bowa missed 2B on the double play attempt
27 minute delay before start of game due to light failure
suspended,19700905,PIT07,tarpaulin machine $game suspended here when tarpaulin machine jammed before covering the field during a rain delay; game concluded the next day
Terry Harmon left with pulled thigh muscle
